CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 3, 1951, pg. 9 reads: "IKS Honors Red Feather Volunteers - Groups which made their Community Chest contributions through the agency and individual solicitors were awarded certificates and souvenirs last Monday at the Irene Kaufmann Settlement. Present for the evening celebration were, left to right, Mrs. Julia Scott, Grandmothers Club; Mrs. Mary Reynolds, Mrs. Mary Barnett, Kenneth Hopkins; a Pitt social work student whose placement is at IKS, making the presentation; Miss Helen Raif, also a Pitt student; Mrs. Mabel Harris, Mrs. Isadora Brown, Grandmothers Club; Mrs. Mary Lee, Hill District Peoples Forum; Mrs. Betty Blanks, We[d]nesday Night Aged Group; Mrs. Priscilla Lee, Parents Nite Out Club, and Mrs. Laomie Ridley.  The younger groups were honored in an afternoon celebration. -Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Red Feather Volunteer award winners, left to right, Julia Scott, Mary Reynolds, Mary Barnett, Pitt students Kenneth Hopkins and Helen Raif; Mabel Harris, Isadora Brown, Mary Lee, Betty Blanks, Priscilla Lee, and Laomie Ridley, standing in the Irene Kaufmann Settlement
